info.title: Paragraph API
info.description:
Public API for interacting with Paragraph publications, posts, users, and tokenized content.

## Authentication
All endpoints require an API key passed in the `x-api-key` header.

## Rate Limiting
API requests are rate-limited to ensure fair usage. Contact support for higher limits.

## Pagination
List endpoints support cursor-based pagination using `cursor` and `limit` parameters.
